title: Looking for the Pictoplasma.com logo typeface. Does anyone have an idea what it could be?
content:
Hi, I need some help identifying the typeface used for the Pictoplasma logotype.  
I saw it on the pictoplasma.com website.  
Any ressembling typeface suggestions would also be appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pictoplasma.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041217/http:/typophile.com/files/pictoplasma.jpg) | 22.98 KB |
author: thomasp

comments.content: It seems to be a font of emigre type foundry
